definitions: Be deprived of or cease to have or retain (something).
Become unable to find (something or someone).
Suffer a reduction in the amount or quality of.
Fail to win (a game, contest, or argument).
Allow (something) to escape or be taken away.
examples: I don't want to lose you.
He tends to lose his keys.
They lost the game by one point.
Don't lose sight of your goals.
